FuncDef:
The mirror statistic enable command enables the mirroring statistics function.
The undo mirror statistic enable command disables the mirroring statistics function.
By default, the mirroring statistics function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the mirroring statistics function, run the mirror statistic enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
